title: Manipulating response leads to free access to Streamlabs Prime

profile.name: Logitech
profile.about: Logitech is a consumer electronics manufacturer, specialising in smart home and video collaboration equipment, gaming accessories and peripherals

vulnerability_information:
Heyy team,
I have a found cool bug which allows me to get access to  streamlabs  prime features for free.

Here is the api endpoint which checks whether the user has a prime subscription or not:

https://streamlabs.com/api/v5/user/prime/subscription

```json
{
  "is_active": false,
  "is_pending": false,
  "is_past_due": false,
  "is_canceled": false,
  "is_pro": false,
  "type": "",
  "free_trial_claimed": false,
  "hibernate_claimed": false,
  "free_trial_eligible": false,
  "hibernate_eligible": false,
  "cooldown_eligible": false,
  "cooldown_seconds_past": null
}
```
Everything was set to false, so I decided to use the Burp's *Match and Replace* rule to replace every ocurrence of *false* in the Response body to *true*.
And as expected I got access to some of the prime features, the most interesting one was the streamlabs All Stars rewards, which is available at this url, https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/streamlabs-rewards?skipPrimeOnboarding=1

When a user which doesn't have the Streamlabs Prime tries to access the streamlabs-reward endpoint the *reedeemed* option won't be there:

{F1142675}

Now after setting the match and replace in burp now if we try to visit the  streamlabs-reward endpoint.

{F1142677}

To confirm that I can actually redeem the reward I went ahead and clicked on the redeem button then it asked for en email and I used my hackerone alias email. Just in few seconds a mail arrived in my inbox with the *code* which I can use to get the Logitech mouse for free

{F1142679}
{F1142680}



I checked other features too like Multistreaming, I was able to get the *RTMP url* and *Stream key*
https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/multistream/settings

Without match and replace rule set:
{F1142690}

After setting match and replace rule:
{F1142698}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


**Steps to Reproduce:**

In your burpsuite *Match and Replace* rule add this two entries:

```
1st.
Type: Response Body
Match: false
Replace: true
``` 
```
2nd.
Type: Response Body
Match: "blocked":true
Replace: "blocked":false
```
Similar to this in the screenshot

{F1142700}

1. Now goto https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/streamlabs-rewards?skipPrimeOnboarding=1
2. The redeem button should be there, as I have shown above in the screenshots F1142677
3. Click on the button , provide your email and you should get the coupon code

Similar steps for checking the multistreaming endpoint,https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/multistream/settings


**Note:** It might happen that when you  load this url: https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/streamlabs-rewards?skipPrimeOnboarding=1, this page might appear where it asks you to connect your paypal acc:

{F1142703}

In that case , provide any fake email id and click on continue and also skip the other options also.Once it done now try to open the streamlab-rewards url in a new tab , if it still doesn't works try loading this url instead https://streamlabs.com/dashboard#/streamlabs-rewards (here I have removed the parameter), keep refreshing the page until you get the right one.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

## Impact

An attacker can exploit this to get free access to prime features and also get free items at no cost as many as he wants .

**PS:** If you don't mind can I use that coupon code, for getting that sweet gaming mouse for free (it looks really cool lol) , no worries if your answer is no :)

Thankyou
Regards
Sudhanshu

activities.message:
Hi @sudi,

Unfortunately, this was submitted previously by another researcher, but we appreciate your work and look forward to additional reports from you.

For transparency, we have invited you to the original report. Please do not comment on the original submission. If you have any further questions or concerns, please post it on this report instead.

Have a great day ahead! 

Best regards,
@turtle_shell

Hey @turtle_shell,
I see that this bug has been reported already but you should  have  look at the impact here in my report  is different than what was showed in this report #1005330, the researcher  showed that he can get access to the *Custom Twitch Bot Name* option and later the logitech team staff commented out that :
@logi_salman
>You cannot use custom bot name or any other prime features by going through this flow.

You can see clearly in my report that I am able to get access other features too like multistreaming, streamlabs All Stars rewards,etc

The All start rewards allows me to get **as many gifts as I want** at **$0.0** cost.
for eg: By creating 1000 accounts I can claim 1000 gifts , the gift is a logitech gaming mice  which cost on average is around $30.
So 1000 logitech gaming mouse costs would be 30*1000 = **$30,000** . I can get all of this for **free**.

I have already shown in my mail where I recieved coupon codes for the logitech gaming mice. 

Some new features have been added to the *Streamlabs Prime* , when the other researcher reported the issue there wasn't any impact I believe. But if you take a look at my report you can see this impact the company financially. 
I have just shown eg for $30,000 this can go even far beyond that. 

Kindly have a look at this report again and also allow the Logitech's team to look into this.

If any more info is required , feel free to ask me . I am happy to assist.

Thankyou
Regards
Sudhanshu
I'll take another look into it - I was also not entirely sure about closing it as a Duplicate. Thanks for the additional information

Hello @sudi,

Thank you for your submission! We were able to validate your report, and have submitted it to the appropriate remediation team for review. They will let us know the final ruling on this report, and when/if a fix will be implemented. Please note that the status and severity are subject to change.

Regards,
@turtle_shell

removed_weaknesses.name: Improper Check or Handling of Exceptional Conditions

activities.message:
Hey team,
I disagree with the bounty amount , regarding as this bug would have allowed any user to get items for free this could lead to a financial loss to the company and also I have shown that i could get access to the other Prime features too.

Can you reconsider the bounty amount please?

Thankyou
Hi @sudi We score all issues per the CVSS system which classifies this as a Medium severity.

hi @sudi this issue is fixed now, please let us know if you are still able to reproduce this.

Thanks

Hey @logi_smaddela,
I can confirm the fix, now if I try to redeem a free gift by following the same way a `403 forbidden error` is received.
Btw I can still get *RTMP url and Stream key* from the multistreaming endpoint.

If it's intended then kindly accept the disclosure request.

Regards
Sudhanshu

Hey team,
If everything this fine is ok , can we disclose this?
